function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Analyzing worldwide scientific literature and statistical analysis from different bibliographic databases","Impact":"Potential exposure to contagious disease data in the research","Mitigation":"Ensure data collection and analysis adheres to strict privacy and data protection regulations","Technologies":"Database encryption and anonymization tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts, individuals contributing to the research","Owner":"Research team, data protection officers"},{"Description":"Searching databases by using various keywords including 'COVID-19'","Impact":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 related data and information","Mitigation":"Use anonymization techniques for COVID-19 data, and ensure compliance with ethical guidelines for handling sensitive health-related data","Technologies":"Anonymization software, ethical data handling protocols","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, ethics committee"},{"Description":"Publication analysis and compilation of publications from 1974 to present date","Impact":"Exposure to historical data that may contain information about past contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough review and filtering of historical data to ensure it does not pose a risk of exposure to sensitive contagious disease information","Technologies":"Data filtering and cleansing tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
